price: 42 Les impies cherchent-ils à tramer un complot ? Mais celui-ci se retournera certainement contre eux.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
